name: Terms & Conditions - Version History Report
description: Returns the version history for the Terms and Conditions. This Advanced Data Set only appears in Data Hub if the Terms and Conditions tool is enabled. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute Terms and Conditions (Organization level) Available Filters: None

columns.name: Version Id
columns.description: Version identifier for the Terms and Conditions.

columns.name: Org Id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the org where the Terms and Conditions are implemented.

columns.name: Language
columns.description: Language of the Terms and Conditions.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: Title of the Terms and Conditions.

columns.name: Terms and Conditions
columns.description: Contents of the Terms and Conditions. This field is restricted to 1000 characters.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Any comments associated with the Terms and Conditions.

columns.name: Version Created Date
columns.description: Date the Terms and Conditions were created.

columns.name: Version Created By Id
columns.description: ID of the user who created the Terms and Conditions.
